thread.title: NBA players react to news of Lamar Odom's hospitalization
thread.title_full: NBA players react to news of Lamar Odom's hospitalization

author: Jury: Aunt who sued over hug gets no money
title: NBA players react to news of Lamar Odom's hospitalization
text:
NBA players react to news of Lamar Odom's hospitalization theScore 5 hrs ago © Gary A. Vasquez-US PRESSWIRE / Reuters Former Los Angeles Lakers forward Lamar Odom was hospitalized Tuesday after being found unconscious in an adult establishment.
AdChoices NBA players, including several of Odom's former teammates, took to Twitter to wish the 14-year veteran well.
Dwyane Wade
Dwyane Wade played with Odom in his sophomore season. Along with leading scorer Eddie Jones, Odom and Wade pushed the Miami Heat to an appearance in the Eastern Conference semifinals before bowing out against the Indiana Pacers .
PRAYERS all the way UP for my brother Lamar Odom!!!
— DWade (@DwyaneWade) October 14, 2015
Baron Davis
Baron Davis never played with Odom, but the two were selected third and fourth respectively in the 1999 NBA Draft.
Praying for my bro L.O 🙏🏿... Real talk to young for this ...
— Baron Davis (@Baron_Davis) October 14, 2015
Eric Gordon
New Orleans Pelicans guard Eric Gordon never played alongside Odom, but he was nearly traded for him in a nixed deal involving Chris Paul .
Prayers up for Lamar Odom. Hoping he keeps fighting and makes it through!
— Eric Gordon (@TheofficialEG10) October 14, 2015
Paul Pierce
Clippers forward Paul Pierce also wished Odom well while overseas in Shanghai as part of NBA Global Games China 2015. Pierce and Odom squared off in the 2008 and 2010 NBA Finals, with each winning a championship apiece for the Lakers and Boston Celtics , respectively.
Prayers go out to Lamar Odom and his family please God anything u can do to help him thru this🙏
— Paul Pierce (@paulpierce34) October 14, 2015
Quentin Richardson
Quentin Richardson was teammates with Odom on the Clippers from 2000-2003.
Praying for @RealLamarOdom !! 🙏🏾🙏🏾🙏🏾🙏🏾🙏🏾
— Quentin Richardson (@QRich) October 14, 2015
Other NBA notables
Praying for Lamar Odom today.
— Roger Mason Jr (@MoneyMase) October 14, 2015
Prayers go out to Lamar Odom. #NBAfamily
— Jonas Jerebko (@JonasJerebko) October 14, 2015
I'm praying really hard for my bro @RealLamarOdom please God bring him through this! He needs you! I'm praying for him and his family!
— Rasual Butler (@RasualButler45) October 14, 2015
Prayers go out to Lamar Odom, he's been through a lot, an incredible person, praying for you bro, just fight another battle. #QueensBoys
— Charlie Villanueva (@CVBelieve) October 14, 2015
Prayers out to my favorite player Lamar Odom! Looked up to him growing up. He is the reason I play ball to this day. Sad to see. 🙏🏽 #LO
— Mitch McGary (@mitchmcgary) October 14, 2015
Prayers to Lamar Odom. One of the lefties I looked up to growing up! God bless
— Justise Winslow (@IAmJustise) October 14, 2015
Metta World Peace, cleary distraught, shakes his head when asked about Lamar Odom: "There's nothing I can say."
— Baxter Holmes (@BaxterHolmes) October 14, 2015
